subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Corey Pavin set the PGA Tour’s nine-hole record with a 26 en route to a three-stroke lead in the suspended first round of the rain-soaked U.S. Bank Championship.
snippet: Corey Pavin set the PGA Tour’s nine-hole record with a 26 en route to a three-stroke lead in the suspended first round of the rain-soaked U.S. Bank Championship.
